name.baseName: Sediment restoration ; in-situ capping ; activated carbon ;Transportation of capping material
底泥修复;原位覆盖;生物炭;运输

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Sources for the production of AC is a fossil anthracite coal-based product from China. Transport from China 20 000 km.
所用生物炭来自中国的无烟煤化石产品，运输距离20000km。

time.common:timeRepresentativenessDescription: There is no clear start time for data collection in the literature, and the start time of the validity period is based on the publication time of the literature
文献中没有明确数据收集的开始时间，以文献发表时间为有效期的开始时间

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: After investigation, no relevant domestic research literature has been found yet.
经查询，暂未找到国内有相关研究文献

technology.technologicalApplicability: The provided Life Cycle Assessment (LCA) data is intended to model the environmental impact of sediment restoration through the in-situ capping method using activated carbon (AC), derived from fossil anthracite coal produced in China. The data is applicable for studies focused on the ecological rehabilitation of water bodies by assessing the transportation and deployment of capping materials across long distances (20000 km) as part of the remediation process.
提供的生命周期评估（LCA）数据旨在模拟通过原位覆盖方法使用来自中国化石无烟煤生产的活性炭（AC）对沉积物修复的环境影响。该数据适用于专注于通过评估跨长距离（20000公里）运输和部署覆盖材料作为修复过程的一部分的水体生态复兴的研究。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: . The life cycle inventories, i.e. the aggregated environmental data collected for the modeled system, are derived from three sources. The main source used for the majority of processes is the Ecoinvent 2.2 database.
Process inventory data是根据ISO 14040关于LCA.35的规定获得的。基本数据来自特定场地的盆栽实验、中试和供应商处获取，这些数据代表了中国南方的情况。二级数据来自Ecoinvent数据库v2.3，从中选择了地理来源和技术因素最相似的过程。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Sparrevik et al. Use of Life Cycle Assessments To Evaluate the Environmental Footprint of Contaminated Sediment Remediation. Environ. Sci. Technol. 2011, 45, 10, 4235–4241
Sparrevik et al. Use of Life Cycle Assessments To Evaluate the Environmental Footprint of Contaminated Sediment Remediation. Environ. Sci. Technol. 2011, 45, 10, 4235–4241

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When utilizing this LCA data, pay attention to the regional specificity of the data as it represents conditions in Southern China. Given the absence of local research literature, users must carefully consider the technological applicability and geographical relevance when extrapolating the data to other regions. The assumed validity period of the data is based on the publication time of the sources. The transportation distance should be confirmed as 20000 km, and any variations must be adjusted for accordingly. It is advised that secondary data from Ecoinvent database version 2.3 should be selected considering the closest geographic and technological similarities. The processes are handled as black-box unit processes, and the base data is gathered from pot experiments, pilot projects, and suppliers from specific sites.

在使用这份LCA数据时，需注意数据的区域特定性，因为它代表了中国南方的情况。鉴于缺乏本地研究文献，用户在将数据外推到其他区域时必须仔细考虑技术适用性和地理相关性。数据的假定有效期是根据来源的发表时间确定的。运输距离应确认为20000公里，且任何变化都必须相应调整。建议根据最接近的地理和技术相似性，从Ecoinvent数据库2.3版本中选择次级数据。过程作为黑箱单元过程处理，基础数据从特定场地的盆栽实验、中试和供应商处获取。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
